name: Bobble Blast
description:
Bobble Blast is an arcade game similar to the famous Puzzle Bobble, where the player has to shoot the falling Bobbles matching the color.  The game goes on until all lives are lost.

It offers both single-player and multiplayer modes.

THE GAME IS ONLY PLAYABLE THROUGH A CONTROLLER!

How to play

Rotate cannon --> Left and right directionals

Change Bobble color --> RB and LB

Shoot cannon --> A
